document_data.Description:
It covers a heavily [[ghost]]-themed campaign setting, ''Ghostwalk''. Although unrelated to the ''[[Forgotten Realms]]'' campaign setting, the book includes suggestions for adapting and placing the ''Ghostwalk'' setting on [[Toril]].
